messages.title: My Promise to You
messages.content: I only ask you to judge me on past performance: my job is to protect you against broken Tory promises, and to defend our jobs, public investment and children’s future. My family live in Swansea West. It’s where they go to school - with my job and their future also on the line. I’ve stood against Conservative cuts to the NHS, education and local government, and will stand for better funded, higher quality services funded through fair taxes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: After years of Conservative delays let's build it now and maximise the environmental and export opportunities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fairer Share of UK Investment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: To build on the City Deal secured for Investment in the Lagoon, Metro and Innovation Future industries.
Arains in Cardiff in 2019 on Tf1fi against Tory plans to leave Swansea out.
Implemented HS2 to unlock investment in Wales and oppose Tory plans to privatise infrastructure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: EU Exit Deal for Swansea Jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: In order to protect 25,000 Swansea jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: No Fracking in Swansea Bay Region
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Its protected area of outstanding natural beauty.
Support later funding for Welsh Assembly for hospitals, schools and our police.
Taxes rising to 60,000 on those with over £2 million.
Stopping privatisation and cuts to our industry.
NHS funded to increase it & use of medical students while improving working conditions.
